message.body: Artsriot is closing their restaurant already! Im underemployed again in two weeks...
Why?! What happened so suddenly-it sounds like you guys are busy.
Even tho its starting to do well its not yet solvent and the owners feel like the restaurant is off course for their mission
Are you hungry? Leonardos or Pho?...Im tuckered out after that exam.
Leos! Ill be home in a little bit
Quick question: do I put the coffee into your espresso maker first, and pour the water into the top part, then wait for it to pour into the bottom?
